translation.zh: ‎这是个几乎充满爱的能量的世界

translation.en: Feel yourself taking in all the love in the universe,
translation.zh: ‎感觉你自己吸收了宇宙中所有的爱

translation.en: and gently, but firmly, place all of it in your heart.
translation.zh:
‎然后温柔而有力地
‎把它全部放在你的心里

translation.en: Right at that moment, you're the principal leader of love in the whole universe.
translation.zh:
‎就在那一刻
‎你是整个宇宙的爱的主要领导人

translation.en: What you do is you want to see the person you're angry at,
translation.zh: ‎而你要做的是 你要看着你生气的人

translation.en: that you hate, that you despise,
translation.zh: ‎你讨厌的人 你鄙视的人

translation.en: and you send all this love you've concentrated
translation.zh: ‎然后把你集中的所有的爱

translation.en: towards the other person.
translation.zh: ‎传送到对方身上

translation.en: You hold nothing back. You give everything.
translation.zh: ‎你毫无保留 你给予一切

translation.en: You feel, not just see,
translation.zh: ‎你感觉到 不仅仅是看到

translation.en: you feel your love enter the other person's body.
translation.zh: ‎你感觉到你的爱进入了对方的身体

translation.en: It's very important.
translation.zh: ‎这非常重要

translation.en: For a minute, you become one.
translation.zh: ‎有那么一瞬间 你俩合而为一

translation.en: At that point, you feel like, "If I can become one with this bastard,
translation.zh:
‎在那一刻 你觉得
‎“要是我能与这个混蛋合而为一

translation.en: I can become one with anybody."
translation.zh: ‎我就能与任何人合而为一”

translation.en: And that's the sense of prowess, almost of mastery.
translation.zh: ‎那是一种能力感 几乎是一种掌控感

translation.en: People say, "Well, you're asking me to love somebody I hate."
translation.zh:
‎人们说“你这是在要求我
‎去爱我讨厌的人”

translation.en: It's not a way to forgive somebody. It's not for the other person.
translation.zh:
‎这不是一个原谅别人的方法
‎这不是为了别人

translation.en: It's to make you feel whole and then free you from the Maze.
translation.zh:
‎这是为了让你感到完整
‎然后把你从迷宫中解放出来

translation.en: Then you can move forward.
translation.zh: ‎好让你可以继续前进

translation.en: So do you wanna be right, or do you wanna create something?
translation.zh: ‎你是想追求正确还是想创造新事物？

translation.en: That's what it always comes down to.
translation.zh: ‎归根结底就是这个问题

translation.en: Life is moving forward.
translation.zh: ‎生活必须向前推进

translation.en: If you want to waste your time playing games over here, you can,
translation.zh:
‎如果你想浪费时间玩游戏
‎你能这么做

translation.en: but you can't get those days, hours back.
translation.zh: ‎但你不能把那些日子和时间找回来

translation.en: When she got older, she became a community organizer,
translation.zh:
‎年纪大些后
‎她成了一名社区组织者

translation.en: and she was awesome.
translation.zh: ‎而且非常了不起

translation.en: If you asked her, "What was your job?" she would say, "Organizing rent strikes."
translation.zh: ‎如果你问她是干什么的 ‎她会说“我靠组织集体抗租活动谋生”

translation.en: "That's what I do for a living." She wasn't scared of anybody.
translation.zh: ‎她会说“我靠组织集体抗租活动谋生” ‎她谁都不怕

translation.en: In fact, the mayor of New York sees my mother and says, "Wait a minute."
translation.zh:
‎事实上 纽约市长看到我妈妈时说 ‎“等一下 在罗莎莉施图茨离开之前
‎我不会进行此次谈判”

translation.en: "I will not proceed with this negotiation until Rosalie Stutz leaves."
translation.zh:
‎“等一下 在罗莎莉施图茨离开之前
‎我不会进行此次谈判”

translation.en: [laughs] And they had to make her leave. He was scared to death of her.
translation.zh:
‎他们不得不让她离开
‎他怕我妈妈怕得要命

translation.en: [Jonah] She turned her tragedy with men into a superpower
translation.zh:
‎她将她与男人的悲剧
‎转变成一种不害怕他们的超能力

translation.en: of not being scared of them and getting great good done.
translation.zh:
‎她将她与男人的悲剧
‎转变成一种不害怕他们的超能力 ‎还取得了伟大的成就

translation.en: Yeah, she did.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: [Jonah] How do you think that affects you,
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你身为一个男人

translation.en: having your mom hate men and you being a man?
translation.zh: ‎妈妈却讨厌男人对你有什么影响？

translation.en: I can feel everybody waiting for the answer,
translation.zh: ‎我能感觉到每个人都在等我的答案

translation.en: but I don't know if I know exactly the answer.
translation.zh: ‎但我不知道我是否知道确切的答案

translation.en: I know one thing for sure. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎有一点我倒是确定

translation.en: It made me insecure around women. I mean, that's a no-brainer.
translation.zh:
‎这让我在女人面前没有安全感
‎不用想也知道

translation.en: It was like there was no pathway inside me
translation.zh: ‎就好像我内心没有任何途径

translation.en: that could step to a woman and feel safe.
translation.zh: ‎可以走到一个女人面前并感到安全

translation.en: I guess that's the best way to say it.
translation.zh: ‎我想这是最好的表达方式

translation.en: [Jonah] Because you think your mom's reaction to you was to, like, cut you down,
translation.zh:
‎因为你觉得
‎你妈妈对你的反应是贬低你

translation.en: and so you couldn't see a way with women where you could feel safe?
translation.zh:
‎所以你看不到
‎能让你感到安全的与女人相处的方式

translation.en: Yeah. It wasn't even on my list of expectations.
translation.zh: ‎对 我压根就没有这种期望

translation.en: The way she would make me feel is, "You have no right to even be doing this."
translation.zh: ‎她给我的感觉是我根本就没有资格

translation.en: I overcame it a little bit, but not--
translation.zh: ‎我稍微克服了一点 但…

translation.en: I didn't overcome it emotionally so much as I did just behaviorally.
translation.zh: ‎只是在行为上克服了 而不是情感上

translation.en: Do you think it made it hard to trust women, like, overall?
translation.zh: ‎你觉得这会让你很难信任女人吗？

translation.en: Not-- Well, is it… Now?
translation.zh: ‎不…嗯 现在吗？

translation.en: It's not that much of an issue now.
translation.zh: ‎现在不是什么大问题了

translation.en: I'll tell you one thing, I'd be a much better partner now than I was years ago.
translation.zh:
‎但我能告诉你 与多年前相比
‎现在的我会是个更好的伴侣

translation.en: Although that's a very low bar.
translation.zh: ‎虽然说这是个很低的标准

translation.en: [chuckling] That's a very low bar.
translation.zh: ‎这是个很低的标准

translation.en: [Jonah] Where do you stand personally on romantic relationships?
translation.zh: ‎你个人对恋爱关系的立场是什么？

translation.en: You mean am I in one, you mean?
translation.zh: ‎你是指我有没有在谈恋爱？

translation.en: [Jonah] Yeah, are you in one?
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: No, I'm not in one. Um…
translation.zh: ‎没有 我没在谈恋爱

translation.en: [Jonah] Did you ever override that wall that was built by your mom
translation.zh: ‎你是否曾推翻过你妈妈筑起的那堵墙

translation.en: and get close in the way you were scared to with a woman?
translation.zh:
‎以你害怕的方式
‎与一个女人亲密接触？

translation.en: I would say,
translation.zh: ‎我会说

translation.en: yeah, once.
translation.zh: ‎有 一次

translation.en: But I… for various reasons, I can't get into the specifics of it.
translation.zh:
‎但由于各种原因
‎我不能详谈具体细节

translation.en: [Jonah] Was this a long time ago? Was this, like, in recent years?
translation.zh:
‎是很久以前的事吗？
‎还是近几年的事？

translation.en: It's been on and off for 40 years.
translation.zh: ‎断断续续了40年

translation.en: [chuckles] As crazy as that might sound.
translation.zh: ‎我知道听起来很疯狂

translation.en: [Jonah] And what prevents it from being constant?
translation.zh: ‎是什么阻碍了它的持续发展？

translation.en: I'll just say it in general terms.
translation.zh: ‎我就笼统地说一下

translation.en: She has other family stuff that, uh,
translation.zh: ‎她有其他家事

translation.en: goes… takes her in completely the opposite direction.
translation.zh: ‎那些把她带到了完全相反的方向

translation.en: And also my health, you know.
translation.zh: ‎加上我的健康状况

translation.en: I got the, um…
translation.zh: ‎我得了…

translation.en: When I got the Parkinson's, it had a double effect on me.
translation.zh:
‎当我得了帕金森病时
‎它对我产生了双重影响

translation.en: It's funny. You know, today I hardly…
translation.zh: ‎说来好笑 今天我几乎没…

translation.en: Wow, that's really good. [Jonah] Yeah, you're not even shaking at all.
translation.zh:
‎-哇 真的不错
‎-是 你完全没颤抖

translation.en: Would you be willing to follow me around? Because you seem to be helping.
translation.zh:
‎你愿不愿意跟在我身边？
‎因为你似乎对我有帮助

translation.en: I'd give you off-- You just have to stay with me every day
translation.zh:
‎会让你休息的 ‎你只需要每天陪我陪到晚上七八点
‎然后就放你走

translation.en: till about 7:00, 8:00 at night, then you're free--
translation.zh:
‎你只需要每天陪我陪到晚上七八点
‎然后就放你走

translation.en: [Jonah] Don't go on a fucking comedy routine right now.
translation.zh: ‎别现在搞喜剧表演

translation.en: -Stay on track, bro. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-回到题上来 老兄
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: -[Jonah] I know what you're doing. -Thank you.
translation.zh:
‎-我知道你在干什么
‎-谢谢你

translation.en: [Jonah] So the illness and her family stuff.
translation.zh: ‎所以你的病情和她的家事

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Jonah] I can't relate to having Parkinson's,
translation.zh: ‎我无法想象得帕金森病是什么感觉

translation.en: but do you ever think that can be a crutch
translation.zh: ‎但你有没有想过 自己会拿它做借口

translation.en: to not just make a decision that would be scary emotionally?
translation.zh:
‎因而不去做
‎情感上会令你恐惧的决定？

translation.en: Uh, yes, 100%.
I think that crazy part of me--
translation.zh: ‎我觉得自己疯狂的那一面

translation.en: It takes whatever is happening and uses it to prove its point.
translation.zh:
‎会用正在发生的事情
‎来证明自己的观点

translation.en: [Jonah] But that's your Part X preventing you from making that decision.
translation.zh:
‎但那是你的第X部分
‎在阻止你做出那个决定

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Jonah] You know, I think my big fear with, uh, romantic relationships,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我对恋爱关系的巨大恐惧…

translation.en: what I'm learning is, is, like, the only way
translation.zh:
‎我学到的是 ‎要想拥有成功的恋爱关系
‎唯一的方法就是完全展示自己的脆弱

translation.en: for them to succeed is for you to be completely vulnerable.
translation.zh:
‎要想拥有成功的恋爱关系
‎唯一的方法就是完全展示自己的脆弱

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Jonah] And humans are so fucked-up, and we just talk ourselves out of happiness so often
translation.zh:
‎而人类的心灵是如此受伤
‎以至于我们经常说服自己放弃幸福

translation.en: that maybe it's worth trying to push you to at least think about it.
translation.zh:
‎所以也许值得尝试
‎推动你去至少考虑一下

translation.en: Well, you've definitely succeeded in that.
translation.zh: ‎这一点你无疑成功了

translation.en: I can't tell you, in the last, let's say, three minutes,
translation.zh: ‎我无法告诉你在过去的三分钟里

translation.en: how many jokes I've had to repress.
translation.zh: ‎有多少个笑话我忍住了没说

translation.en: [Jonah] I get it.
translation.zh: ‎我能理解

translation.en: I have the same disease, which is avoid emotion by making jokes.
translation.zh:
‎我也有同样的病
‎那就是用讲笑话来逃避情绪

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: [Jonah] Can I ask a random question, and you can just tell me to fuck off?
translation.zh:
‎我能问个无关的问题吗？
‎问完了你可以让我滚蛋

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: [Jonah] Do you think…
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你会…

translation.en: you will call her
translation.zh: ‎给她打电话

translation.en: or have some sort of new insight on that relationship?
translation.zh: ‎或者对那段关系有新的见解吗？

translation.en: It… it feels like it, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎感觉会

translation.en: Do you mean that, or are you just placating to me?
translation.zh:
‎你是真心这么想
‎还是只是在安抚我？

translation.en: No. I… I mean…
translation.zh: ‎是真心这么想的

translation.en: It… it feels like a source of energy that might help me make a decision like this.
translation.zh:
‎这感觉是一种
‎能推动我去做这种决定的能量来源

translation.en: [Jonah] Yeah, I mean, I guess I don't feel anything except love for you.
translation.zh: ‎我对你除了爱没有其他

translation.en: I just want…
translation.zh: ‎我只是希望…

translation.en: I… I want you to… be happy.
translation.zh: ‎我希望你 ‎幸福

translation.en: No, I feel it. I feel that.
translation.zh: ‎我知道 我感觉得到

translation.en: See, the thing with me that's not typical is the illness stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我身上不典型的地方就是我的病

translation.en: So I think, now that I'm talking about it,
translation.zh: ‎现在说起来

translation.en: I think, unconsciously,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得在潜意识里

translation.en: I was linking a woman, like a relationship, and being cured.
translation.zh:
‎我把女人 把恋爱关系
‎和被治愈联系在了一起

translation.en: [Jonah] But there's no cure for Parkinson's.
translation.zh: ‎但帕金森病是无法治愈的

translation.en: Yes. That's correct.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: But most people aren't sick like that. Um…
translation.zh: ‎大多数人都没病成这样

translation.en: And I've been sick for a long, uh, time.
translation.zh: ‎我已经病了很久了

translation.en: I grew up in Manhattan, so I was used to going out at night.
translation.zh:
‎我在曼哈顿长大
‎所以晚上有出去玩的习惯

translation.en: By the time I was 21, 22, we would go out at least one out of every two nights.
translation.zh:
‎我二十一二岁的时候
‎我们至少每两晚会出去一次

translation.en: It was Friday. I was supposed to meet these two women at some bar downtown.
translation.zh:
‎那是星期五晚上 ‎我跟这两个女人
‎约好在市中心的酒吧见面

translation.en: I said, "Great, I'll be down there in an hour."
translation.zh: ‎我说“好 我一小时后到”

translation.en: And I had been taking a nap.
translation.zh: ‎我当时在打盹

translation.en: I went back to sleep. I said, "Let me just continue this nap for 20 minutes,
translation.zh: ‎我倒头继续睡 ‎想说再睡个20分钟

translation.en: then I'll take a cab downtown."
translation.zh: ‎然后就打车到市中心

translation.en: I woke up Monday morning.
translation.zh: ‎我醒来的时候已经是星期一早上了

translation.en: And I said, "I am really fucked. Something is terribly wrong."
translation.zh: ‎我当时想 完蛋了 我身体严重不对劲

translation.en: Complete exhaustion. Like an exhaustion so deep…
translation.zh: ‎极度的疲惫 疲惫到…

translation.en: Let me put it this way.
translation.zh: ‎这么说吧

translation.en: If I had to go to the cleaners, right across the street from my house,
translation.zh:
‎如果我得去一趟洗衣店
‎就在我家对面

translation.en: I would have to think, "Okay, can I do this or not?"
translation.zh: ‎我必须想 我做不做得到？

translation.en: "Do I have the… the strength to do it?"
translation.zh: ‎我有没有力气走到对面去？

translation.en: But this was not me. I was, like, a very hyperactive person.
translation.zh:
‎但平时的我不是这样的
‎我是非常好动的人

translation.en: So then I went to a neurologist.
translation.zh: ‎所以后来我去看了神经科医生

translation.en: In one meeting, he told me, "Oh, you have cervical stenosis,
translation.zh:
‎第一次看诊他就告诉我
‎“你有颈椎管狭窄症

translation.en: you need immediate surgery, and you have Parkinson's disease."
translation.zh:
‎你需要马上动手术
‎而且你有帕金森病”

translation.en: [Jonah] What did it feel like that day?
translation.zh: ‎那天你是什么心情？

translation.en: See, this is my real Shadow coming out
translation.zh: ‎想到要让你看到我的笔迹

translation.en: when you're gonna see what my handwriting looks like.
translation.zh: ‎我真正的阴影面就出来了

translation.en: [Jonah] Why?
translation.zh: ‎为什么？

translation.en: Because it's barely legible.
translation.zh: ‎因为它几乎无法辨认

translation.en: I don't even like looking at it.
translation.zh: ‎我甚至连看都不想看

translation.en: I used to be very good with my hands.
translation.zh: ‎我以前双手非常灵活

translation.en: I was very good at basketball, but anything, I was dexterous.
translation.zh:
‎我篮球打得很好
‎但最重要的是我的手很灵巧

translation.en: Now,
translation.zh: ‎现在嘛

translation.en: well, it speaks for itself. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎不言而喻

translation.en: But what I try to do when I get that fear,
translation.zh: ‎但当这种恐惧感涌现时

translation.en: I try to see my Shadow right at that moment.
translation.zh: ‎我会试着在那一刻直面我的阴影面

translation.en: "He looks cachectic." You know what that means?
translation.zh:
‎他看起来一副恶病质样
‎懂是什么意思吗？

translation.en: -Emaciated? -[Stutz] Yeah, emaciated.
translation.zh:
‎-瘦骨嶙峋吗？
‎-对

translation.en: -Yeah. -[Stutz] That's how my Shadow looks now.
translation.zh:
‎-是
‎-那就是我的阴影面现在的样子

translation.en: It's like I'll fall apart.
translation.zh: ‎就像我会散架一样

translation.en: [Jonah] Do you think medical issues can lead to a lonelier existence?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得健康问题
‎会导致一个人觉得更孤独吗？

translation.en: -Yes. [splutters] Yes. -[Jonah] Why?
translation.zh:
‎-会
‎-为什么？

translation.en: It was, literally, for a while there, I was afraid to go outside.
translation.zh: ‎有一阵子 我甚至不敢出门

translation.en: [Jonah] Did you ever think about having kids?
translation.zh: ‎你有没有想过要孩子？

translation.en: Yeah, all the time, but now… it's too late now.
translation.zh: ‎一直都想 但现在已经太晚了

translation.en: I… and I wouldn't want to have a kid now.
translation.zh: ‎我现在不想要孩子

translation.en: [Jonah] Hmm. Why not?
translation.zh: ‎为什么？

translation.en: I'm still so weak.
translation.zh: ‎我还是很虚弱

translation.en: If I have to get out of this chair, I have to think about it.
translation.zh:
‎如果我想从这椅子上站起来
‎我都得想一想

translation.en: There'll be so many moments where I wasn't actually capable of being part of the thing.
translation.zh:
‎所以会有很多时刻
‎我实际上都无法参与其中

translation.en: -[Jonah] Hmm. -I don't think it'd be a great idea.
translation.zh: ‎所以我不认为那是个好主意

translation.en: [Jonah] That fucking sucks, man.
translation.zh: ‎真他妈糟透了

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎是糟透了

translation.en: [splutters] But if that hadn't happened,
translation.zh: ‎但这种情况要是没发生

translation.en: the last bit of information I've been developing, I wouldn't have gotten.
translation.zh: ‎我一直在开发的信息也就不会存在

translation.en: It's like every time I get pushed down and crushed,
translation.zh: ‎每当我被推倒、被压垮的时候

translation.en: I seem to get more information.
translation.zh: ‎我似乎都能得到更多的信息

translation.en: Parkinson's has made me aware of time. Like, really aware of it.
translation.zh: ‎帕金森病让我真正地意识到了时间

translation.en: My sense of mission, my sense of this is what I'm supposed to do,
translation.zh:
‎这就是我的使命
‎这就是我应该做的事

translation.en: that got much stronger in me.
translation.zh: ‎这种感觉变得更加强烈了

translation.en: If I don't do that, I start to think about,
translation.zh: ‎如果我不这么做 我就会开始想

translation.en: "Oh, shit, this happened to me."
translation.zh:
‎“唉 这种事竟然发生在我身上
‎真没劲”

translation.en: "What a drag." You know, it makes life harder.
translation.zh:
‎“唉 这种事竟然发生在我身上
‎真没劲” ‎这让生活更艰难

translation.en: Then you go into this whole pity party thing.
translation.zh: ‎然后你就开始自怨自艾

translation.en: It's a complete waste of time.
translation.zh: ‎这完全是浪费时间

translation.en: [Jonah] Do you ever get in that zone? The pity party zone?
translation.zh: ‎你会掉进那个自怨自艾的深渊吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I get in it all the time,
translation.zh: ‎会啊 常掉进去

translation.en: but I'm very fast at getting out of it.
translation.zh: ‎但我很快就能跳出来

translation.en: [Jonah] In putting the movie together,
translation.zh: ‎在剪辑电影的时候

translation.en: I started using your drawings to display the tools,
translation.zh: ‎我开始插入你的画来展示这些工具

translation.en: and they are a bit shaky,
translation.zh: ‎但画有点歪歪扭扭的

translation.en: and I wanted to know if it was okay with you if I did that?
translation.zh: ‎所以我想问你介不介意我这么做

translation.en: Oh, it would be great. Definitely do it.
translation.zh: ‎太好了 当然不介意

translation.en: And if it's shaky, it's even better.
translation.zh: ‎如果歪歪扭扭 那就更好了

translation.en: Because the whole premise of this is we're not gonna win every time,
translation.zh:
‎因为这部电影想传达的信息是
‎我们不可能每次都赢

translation.en: we certainly can't be perfect, we can't control it,
translation.zh: ‎我们不可能做到完美 ‎我们无法控制这一点

translation.en: but we have an unstoppable will to go forward.
translation.zh: ‎但我们有不可阻挡的前进的意志

translation.en: And this reminds you of it.
translation.zh: ‎而我的卡片会提醒你这一点

translation.en: Each card has a little bit of a different approach to basically the same goal,
translation.zh:
‎每张卡片都以稍微不同的方式
‎去实现相同的目标

translation.en: which is, "Schmuck, take action, no matter how frightened you are."
translation.zh:
‎那就是
‎“笨蛋 行动起来 不管你有多害怕”

translation.en: [Jonah] That reminds me of Radical Acceptance, which is a big one
translation.zh:
‎这让我想起了全然接纳 ‎这工具很有效
‎它助我解决了很多问题

translation.en: and really helps me work through a lot.
translation.zh:
‎这工具很有效
‎它助我解决了很多问题

translation.en: That's right. That's exactly right.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: Here's the thing. Every event has something in it that you can learn from.
translation.zh:
‎事情是这样的
‎每个事件都有你能从中学习的东西

translation.en: When something goes wrong,
translation.zh: ‎当事情出错时

translation.en: anybody can say, "Well, it's not that bad. I'll recover from it tomorrow."
translation.zh:
‎谁都可以说
‎“也没那么糟啦 睡一觉就没事了”

translation.en: That's not good enough.
translation.zh: ‎这还不够好

translation.en: You have to create a reflex to squeeze the juice out.
translation.zh: ‎你必须建立一种挤出汁液的条件反射

translation.en: Squeezing the juice means finding something meaningful.
translation.zh: ‎挤出汁液意味着找出有意义的东西

translation.en: It's trying to find the state of not getting into a lot of negativity
translation.zh: ‎意味着不让自己陷入消极的情绪中

translation.en: but actually training yourself to say, "What am I gonna do about it now?"
translation.zh:
‎而是训练自己说
‎“我现在要怎么应对？”

translation.en: I gotta do some push-ups.
translation.zh: ‎我得做几个俯卧撑

translation.en: Is there anything that's, you know, strong enough to support my weight?
translation.zh: ‎有没有什么能够支撑我体重的东西？

translation.en: -[Jonah] You wanna do push-ups? -Yeah. I'm getting stiff.
translation.zh:
‎-你要做俯卧撑？
‎-对 我身体有点僵硬了

translation.en: You can do it on the dolly if you want. The push-ups.
translation.zh: ‎你可以在移动车上做俯卧撑

translation.en: [Jonah] Careful, Phil.
translation.zh: ‎小心点 菲尔

translation.en: I've never done this in front of this many people.
translation.zh: ‎我从来没在这么多人面前做过俯卧撑

translation.en: Even if I do, like, ten of these… This is good for this.
translation.zh: ‎即使只是做十个… ‎这太适合用来做俯卧撑了

translation.en: -Can I take this home? -[all laugh]
translation.zh: ‎我能带回家吗？

translation.en: It's the most expensive push-up--
translation.zh: ‎史上最贵的俯卧撑…

translation.en: [Stutz] You're not allowed to make judgements.
translation.zh: ‎第一 你不允许做判断

translation.en: You're not allowed to tell yourself anything negative.
translation.zh: ‎你不允许告诉自己任何负面的东西

translation.en: It doesn't mean you're stupid. It doesn't mean there isn't something negative there.
translation.zh:
‎这并不意味着你很蠢
‎这并不意味着没有负面的东西

translation.en: You're not allowed to go through that. It goes against what we're doing.
translation.zh:
‎而是你不允许去经历
‎那有悖于我们正在做的事

translation.en: Number two, obviously, you want to find something that's positive about it.
translation.zh: ‎第二 你显然要找出一些积极的东西

translation.en: Dude, you're crushing it.
translation.zh: ‎老兄 你挺行啊

translation.en: Well, when you do 100 of these a day, you get stronger. [chuckles]
translation.zh:
‎如果每天做100个俯卧撑
‎自然会变得更强壮嘛

translation.en: -You do 100 of those a day? -Probably.
translation.zh:
‎-你每天都做100个？
‎-是啊

translation.en: Yeah, because every time I stiffen up, I can't move like I should.
translation.zh: ‎因为每次我僵硬起来 我就动不了

translation.en: Yeah, now it's a lot looser, but, you know, I get like this, I can't move either of them.
translation.zh:
‎现在放松很多 僵硬起来的话
‎双手会这样动不了

translation.en: So I discovered this.
translation.zh: ‎所以发现了这个方法

translation.en: Maybe this'll spread the word if you guys don't cut it out of the film.
translation.zh:
‎如果你们不把这段剪掉的话
‎也许观众可以学‎学

translation.en: So squeezing the juice out of the lemon
translation.zh: ‎所以挤出柠檬的汁液

translation.en: means you have not only the will to do this,
translation.zh: ‎意味着你不仅有意愿去做这件事

translation.en: but you have some faith in it.
translation.zh: ‎而且对它有一定的信心

translation.en: There's something there that's valuable.
translation.zh: ‎意味着这里面有有价值的东西

translation.en: And what happens is everything starts to become more meaningful.
translation.zh:
‎接下来会发生的
‎是一切都开始变得更有意义

translation.en: You don't get to the world of meaning through big things.
translation.zh:
‎带你走向意义的世界的
‎不是伟大的事物

translation.en: You get it through small things.
translation.zh: ‎而是那些微小的事物

translation.en: I feel better.
translation.zh: ‎感觉好多了

translation.en: -I feel loose now. -I do that for my mind.
translation.zh:
‎-感觉很放松
‎-我让我妈妈也学学

translation.en: -Oh. -Sorry. [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: [Stutz] You need to look at all events as having value.
translation.zh: ‎你需要把所有事件都看成是有价值的

translation.en: If you can do that, then you're in a zone of tremendous opportunity.
translation.zh:
‎如果你能做到这一点
‎那么等待你的将是巨大的机会

translation.en: That's all I have to say on that.
translation.zh: ‎我要说的就这么多

translation.en: [Jonah] You fucking dropped the mic. That was amazing.
translation.zh: ‎潇洒扔麦 说得太棒了

translation.en: That's one of the best. That's a Stutz greatest hit.
translation.zh:
‎那是最棒的工具之一
‎那是施图茨的精选作品

translation.en: -Yeah, it is one of the best. -[Jonah] I had to use that last night.
translation.zh:
‎-确实是最棒的之一
‎-我昨晚用上了

translation.en: Oh yeah? How did it work out?
translation.zh: ‎是吗？效果如何？

translation.en: [Jonah] So I had an anxiety attack, and I couldn't sleep.
translation.zh: ‎基本上我焦虑发作所以睡不着

translation.en: And instead of having more anxiety about how I'm not getting enough sleep for the next day's work,
translation.zh:
‎但我没有因为怕睡眠不足
‎会影响隔天工作而感到更焦虑

translation.en: I used Radical Acceptance and was able to actually use that time
translation.zh:
‎而是采用了全然接纳
‎并成功利用那段时间

translation.en: to come up with more new ideas for the shoot today.
translation.zh: ‎为今天的拍摄想出更多的新想法

translation.en: Yeah, well, you did a good job.
translation.zh: ‎你做得很不错

translation.en: Don't fuck this up now.
translation.zh: ‎可别搞砸了

translation.en: Did I say anything about Cain and Abel?
translation.zh: ‎我有没有提到该隐与亚伯的事？

translation.en: Maybe not. [Jonah] You went to high school with them?
translation.zh:
‎-应该没有
‎-你和他们一起上的高中吗？

translation.en: [Stutz] I actually remember… I think I was nine. It wasn't like today
translation.zh:
‎我记得当时我好像是九岁 ‎那时候不像现在这样
‎那时候坐飞机是大事

translation.en: where you just hop on a plane. It was a big deal.
translation.zh:
‎那时候不像现在这样
‎那时候坐飞机是大事

translation.en: And it was-- You couldn't see shit. It was one of those overcast days.
translation.zh: ‎那天是个阴天 什么都看不见

translation.en: My father was talking to me about some of this stuff… [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我就跟我爸爸在聊这些 然后他说

translation.en: …and he said, "Don't worry."
translation.zh:
‎我就跟我爸爸在聊这些 然后他说 ‎“别担心 我们会飞到乌云上面
‎然后就会看到太阳了”

translation.en: "We'll get above this, and the sun will be out."
translation.zh:
‎“别担心 我们会飞到乌云上面
‎然后就会看到太阳了”

translation.en: [splutters] I just couldn't believe it.
translation.zh: ‎我简直无法相信

translation.en: I thought, "What, are you crazy?"
translation.zh: ‎我心想“你疯了吗？”

translation.en: This-- How could the sun still be up there
translation.zh: ‎我眼前这片乌云是如此密集

translation.en: when it's so dense, and I'm seeing all these clouds?
translation.zh: ‎太阳怎么可能还在上面？

translation.en: And then, I remember the exact moment
translation.zh: ‎我还记得太阳冲破云层的那一刻

translation.en: the sun broke through the cloud, and I was so amazed.
translation.zh: ‎我还记得太阳冲破云层的那一刻 ‎我感到惊叹不已

translation.en: It's like the whole model of the universe became different because…
translation.zh:
‎就像整个宇宙的模型变得不同了
‎因为…

translation.en: The importance of it was I was no longer judging the nature of reality
translation.zh:
‎它的重要性在于
‎我不再根据过去五分钟的经历

translation.en: by my experiences in the last five minutes.
translation.zh: ‎去判断现实的本质

translation.en: The sun is always up there.
translation.zh: ‎太阳总是在那里

translation.en: The cloud is always over here, blocking the sun.
translation.zh: ‎而云总是在这里 挡住了太阳

translation.en: If you can't break through, you think it's a very bad day.
translation.zh:
‎如果你无法突破
‎你就会觉得那是很糟糕的一天

translation.en: In fact, you think it's a very bad life.
translation.zh: ‎你甚至会觉得那是很糟糕的人生

translation.en: Every thought you have is gonna affect your mood.
translation.zh: ‎你的每一个念头都会影响你的心情

translation.en: Every thought you have is gonna be either positive or negative.
translation.zh:
‎你的念头要么是积极的
‎要么是消极的

translation.en: So the Grateful Flow wants to choose the positives.
translation.zh: ‎感恩之流要你选择积极的念头

translation.en: Part X wants you to have the negative flow,
translation.zh: ‎第X部分要你选择消极的念头

translation.en: so it'll create the cloud up there so you can't see the sun.
translation.zh:
‎所以它就在天上制造一些乌云
‎让你看不见太阳

translation.en: You forget that it's actually sunny up there.
translation.zh: ‎让你忘记天上实际上是阳光明媚的

translation.en: The question becomes, "How do you penetrate the cloud?"
translation.zh: ‎所以问题是 你该如何突破云层？

translation.en: And the answer is, "With gratefulness."
translation.zh: ‎答案是感恩之情

translation.en: It gives you the sensation, the feeling,
translation.zh: ‎它给你的感觉是

translation.en: that there's always something up there positive even if you can't see it at all.
translation.zh:
‎那里总是有一些积极的东西
‎即使你完全看不见

translation.en: But you have to have a mechanism. That's where the tool comes in.
translation.zh:
‎但你需要一种机制
‎这时工具就派上用场了

translation.en: The Grateful Flow is not the things you're grateful for.
translation.zh: ‎感恩之流不是你感恩的东西

translation.en: The Grateful Flow is the process of creating these things.
translation.zh: ‎感恩之流是创造这些东西的过程

translation.en: So close your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎闭上眼睛

translation.en: Now, what you want to do is you say two or three, at most four,
translation.zh:
‎现在我要你说出两个或三个
‎最多四个

translation.en: things you're grateful for.
translation.zh: ‎你感恩的东西

translation.en: The smaller the thing, the better,
translation.zh: ‎这东西越小越好

translation.en: because it forces you to concentrate gratefulness.
translation.zh: ‎因为它迫使你集中感恩之情

translation.en: You wanna do it nice and slow. You want to feel the gratefulness.
translation.zh: ‎慢慢来 好好去感受那股感恩之情

translation.en: I'm grateful for my nephews.
translation.zh: ‎我感恩有我的侄子们

translation.en: I'm grateful for surfing.
translation.zh: ‎我感恩有冲浪

translation.en: I'm grateful…
translation.zh: ‎我感恩…

translation.en: for my dog.
translation.zh: ‎有我的狗

translation.en: I'm grateful for you.
translation.zh: ‎我感恩有你

translation.en: [Stutz] Okay, now, keep naming things, but don't say them out loud.
translation.zh: ‎好 继续罗列 但不要大声说出来

translation.en: Just keep creating that stream of gratefulness.
translation.zh: ‎继续创造源源不断的感恩之情

translation.en: Good.
translation.zh: ‎很好

translation.en: The next thing you do is you feel
translation.zh:
‎接下来你要感觉自己
‎即将产生另一个感恩的念头

translation.en: that you're going to create another grateful thought, but you don't.
translation.zh:
‎接下来你要感觉自己
‎即将产生另一个感恩的念头 ‎但你把这个念头打住

translation.en: You block it. So all you feel is the force that would create a grateful thought,
translation.zh:
‎但你把这个念头打住 ‎所以你所感觉到的
‎只是这股产生感恩念头的力量

translation.en: and as it gets stronger and stronger, you feel taken over by it.
translation.zh:
‎随着它变得越来越强大
‎你感觉自己被它征服

translation.en: That's the Grateful Flow. That was excellent. Did you feel anything?
translation.zh: ‎这就是感恩之流 ‎做得很棒 有什么感觉吗？

translation.en: I felt everything kind of just… slow down.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得一切都 ‎慢了下来

translation.en: And I felt a warmth.
translation.zh: ‎我感觉到一股温暖

translation.en: -[Stutz] Mm-hmm. -Like in a sense of comfort.
translation.zh: ‎一种安逸感

translation.en: [Stutz] That's pretty good.
translation.zh: ‎不错

translation.en: The key is not saying the same things over and over that you're grateful for.
translation.zh: ‎关键是不要重复着说同样的东西

translation.en: You wanna make it a creative act.
translation.zh: ‎它必须是个具有创造性的行为

translation.en: When you have to dig and work on it to find these things,
translation.zh:
‎当你不得不去
‎挖掘和努力寻找这些东西时

translation.en: that process itself will change your mood.
translation.zh: ‎那个过程本身就会改变你的心情

translation.en: The classic time to use it is when your thoughts are out of control.
translation.zh:
‎最经典的用法
‎就是在你思绪失去控制的时候

translation.en: The worst thing to do is argue with them.
translation.zh: ‎你最不该做的就是与它们争论

translation.en: 'Cause its effect on you is terrible, and it does nothing for you.
translation.zh: ‎那只会给你带来恶劣的影响 ‎而且对你没有任何帮助

translation.en: But gratefulness is not just, "I'm lucky somebody helped me," or whatever.
translation.zh:
‎但感恩不仅仅是
‎“我很庆幸有人帮了我”

translation.en: Gratefulness is the state you want to be in
translation.zh: ‎感恩是你想尽可能经常处于的状态

translation.en: as often as you possibly can be in it, because it's the state that connects you…
translation.zh: ‎感恩是你想尽可能经常处于的状态 ‎因为这种状态能带你突破云层

translation.en: It's the state that breaks through the cloud.
translation.zh: ‎因为这种状态能带你突破云层

translation.en: And once you're up there, you're in a different world.
translation.zh:
‎一旦突破了
‎你就进入了一个不同的世界

translation.en: What Part X does is to say you shouldn't be grateful. It says, "You got screwed."
translation.zh:
‎第X部分所做的是说
‎“你不应该感恩 你被搞惨了

translation.en: "You're a victim. You didn't get enough."
translation.zh: ‎你是受害者 你得到的不够多

translation.en: "Why should you be grateful for what you have?"
translation.zh: ‎你为什么要为你所拥有的而感恩？”

translation.en: That's the devil talking. That's classic Part X.
translation.zh:
‎那是魔鬼在说话
‎那就是典型的第X部分

translation.en: I don't talk to you about your Parkinson's a ton.
translation.zh: ‎我很少和你谈起你的帕金森病

translation.en: And I wonder what part of it is my fear of just not wanting to acknowledge
translation.zh: ‎我不知道其中有哪一部分是因为

translation.en: my own fears around that stuff.
translation.zh: ‎我不想承认自己对这件事的恐惧

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, my advice to you is assume that you're probably underestimating me,
translation.zh: ‎嗯 我会给你的建议是 ‎假设你自己低估了我

translation.en: um, because I continue every day to make adjustments,
translation.zh: ‎因为我每天都在继续做调整

translation.en: and a lot of them are very helpful.
translation.zh: ‎而且很多调整都非常有帮助

translation.en: I don't know. I'm funny, you know?
translation.zh: ‎不知道啦 我是搞笑派的嘛

translation.en: That's not the kind of thing that I think about a lot.
translation.zh: ‎这不是我经常会去想的事

translation.en: I think about the future,
translation.zh: ‎我会去想未来

translation.en: but mostly, my biggest fear is not getting enough done before I die.
translation.zh:
‎但我最大的恐惧是
‎没能在我死前做完我要做的事

translation.en: -Hmm. -'Cause I got so much--
translation.zh:
‎因为我有好多事要做
‎我们在这里谈到的东西

translation.en: The stuff we talked about here is maybe, I don't know, 10% of it.
translation.zh:
‎因为我有好多事要做
‎我们在这里谈到的东西 ‎可能只是其中的10%

translation.en: A sliver, yeah.
translation.zh: ‎只是一小部分 对

translation.en: Yeah, I think death in itself is a really…
translation.zh: ‎我觉得死亡本身对每个人来说

translation.en: [exhales] It's a complex subject for everybody.
translation.zh: ‎都是个复杂的话题

translation.en: For me, I am…
translation.zh: ‎对我来说

translation.en: very scared to lose you particularly.
translation.zh: ‎我特别害怕失去你

translation.en: Not that that's on my mind all the time,
translation.zh: ‎并不是说我一直都在想这件事

translation.en: but, like, you are the person I go to for life advice
translation.zh: ‎但你是我去寻求人生建议的人

translation.en: and for a sense of comfort that there is ways through things.
translation.zh:
‎你带给我安慰
‎让我知道人生总会有出路

translation.en: And at the same time,
translation.zh: ‎同时

translation.en: you… the only time I've had massive experience with death,
translation.zh: ‎我唯一一次经历沉痛的死别时

translation.en: you were the person that got me through that as well.
translation.zh: ‎也是你帮我渡过了难关

translation.en: -You're talking about your brother? -Yeah. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎你是说你哥哥？ ‎对

translation.en: And when he passed away unexpectedly a few years ago,
translation.zh: ‎几年前他意外去世

translation.en: and before I made this movie, I didn't know that you had lost your brother.
translation.zh:
‎在我拍这部电影之前
‎我并不知道你弟弟已经去世了

translation.en: You told a story about where you were that day.
translation.zh: ‎你讲了那个故事 说你那天在哪里

translation.en: -Oh yeah. -You knew the spot where you were.
translation.zh:
‎-对
‎-你那天所站的位置

translation.en: You went to school that day and all those things and…
translation.zh: ‎你那天去了学校等等

translation.en: I spend a lot of my life avoiding thinking about that day,
translation.zh: ‎我一直在逃避 不愿去想那一天

translation.en: and I went to your office that morning.
translation.zh: ‎那天早上我去了你的办公室

translation.en: It was definitely the most intense day in my life.
translation.zh: ‎那绝对是我一生中最难熬的一天

translation.en: It's definitely, like, the most shook-up I've ever been.
translation.zh: ‎绝对是我这辈子最崩溃的一刻

translation.en: One of the things I remember was, that day, you said, "Give me your phone,"
translation.zh:
‎我记得的一件事是
‎那天你跟我要了手机

translation.en: and you took a picture of me.
translation.zh: ‎然后给我拍了一张照片

translation.en: And I, like, wondered why you did that?
translation.zh: ‎我想知道你为什么这么做

translation.en: It is very rare in life that you get a chance to record something
translation.zh:
‎能有机会把人生中最重要的时刻
‎记录下来

translation.en: at the climactic, you know, most important moment.
translation.zh:
‎能有机会把人生中最重要的时刻
‎记录下来 ‎这是非常难得的

translation.en: And then you come back to it.
translation.zh: ‎之后再回过头来看它

translation.en: Whether it's in a week or a year, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
‎不管是一星期后还是一年后
‎都无所谓

translation.en: You… you have, um, a… There's a time gap.
translation.zh: ‎中间隔上一段时间

translation.en: And in that time gap,
translation.zh: ‎在这段时间里

translation.en: you actually experience the forces of healing, of recovery.
translation.zh: ‎你能真正体验到疗愈的力量

translation.en: Yeah, I… I haven't looked at this picture in four years.
translation.zh: ‎我已经四年没看过这张照片了

translation.en: But I, like, printed it out, because I wanted to show you and look at it.
translation.zh:
‎但我把它打印了出来
‎因为我想给你看 自己也看一下

translation.en: You haven't looked at it for four years? [Jonah] No.
translation.zh:
‎-你已经四年没看过了？
‎-对

translation.en: In a good way…
translation.zh: ‎从好的方面来说

translation.en: it's like it's… I look stripped of everything fake.
translation.zh: ‎我看起来像被剥去了虚假的一切

translation.en: And there is an oddly serene look on my face.
translation.zh:
‎-我的神情异常宁静
‎-对

translation.en: -[Stutz] There is. -Which is, like, so bizarre.
translation.zh: ‎真的好怪

translation.en: But maybe because it, like, demolished…
translation.zh: ‎但也许是因为它摧毁了

translation.en: everything that didn't matter.
translation.zh: ‎一切不重要的东西

translation.en: [Stutz] It demolished everything you thought you needed but you don't need.
translation.zh:
‎它摧毁了你以为自己需要
‎但其实并不需要的一切

translation.en: That's the picture of somebody who's gone through hell
translation.zh: ‎照片里的那个人走了一趟地狱

translation.en: and came out the other side and is really okay,
translation.zh: ‎并且回来了 而且也好好的

translation.en: in a very nondramatic way, which I like.
translation.zh: ‎过程平淡无奇 但我很喜欢

translation.en: That's a picture of victory, even though it might not look like it.
translation.zh:
‎尽管可能看起来不像
‎这就是胜利的样子

translation.en: Loss Processing is a tool that allows you to process loss, right?
translation.zh:
‎丧失处理
‎是帮助你处理丧失的工具 对吧？

translation.en: And most people are very bad at it.
translation.zh: ‎大多数人在这方面都做得不好

translation.en: Not only are they bad when there's a loss and they get depressed or bereft,
translation.zh:
‎他们不仅在经历丧失时处理得不好
‎因而感到抑郁或失落

translation.en: but before there's a loss, they're just worrying about a loss.
translation.zh:
‎而且在丧失还未发生前
‎就一直担心它会发生

translation.en: The goal of this is to get what's called the potency of nonattachment.
translation.zh:
‎我们的目标是要获得
‎所谓的不执着的效力

translation.en: That means I can pursue something, but I'm willing not to have it.
translation.zh:
‎这意味着我能去追求一样东西
‎但我愿意不拥有它

translation.en: I still wanna pursue it. I want to pursue it really hard.
translation.zh:
‎我还是想追求它
‎我想非常努力地追求它

translation.en: But I'm also willing to lose.
translation.zh: ‎但我也愿意失去它

translation.en: The first thing I want you to do is pick out something that you feel you've become too attached to.
translation.zh:
‎首先我要你挑出一样
‎你觉得自己过于依恋的东西

translation.en: It could be a person, a job, something small. It doesn't matter.
translation.zh:
‎可以是一个人 一份工作
‎一个小东西 都无所谓

translation.en: But something where you're loath to let go of it.
translation.zh: ‎总之是一个你不愿意放手的东西

translation.en: You're afraid, if you let go of it, something terrible's gonna happen.
translation.zh:
‎你害怕如果你放开它
‎可怕的事情就会发生

translation.en: -You have it? -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎想到了吗？

translation.en: [Stutz] Okay.
translation.zh: ‎好

translation.en: Now imagine you're grasping this thing.
translation.zh: ‎现在想象你在抓住这个东西

translation.en: And if it's not a material thing, it doesn't matter.
translation.zh: ‎如果它不是物质的东西也无所谓

translation.en: Just imagine you're grasping it,
translation.zh: ‎只要想象你在抓住它

translation.en: like you're grasping onto a branch on a tree.
translation.zh: ‎就像抓住树上的树枝一样

translation.en: It's scary. You're afraid to let go.
translation.zh: ‎很可怕 你不敢放手

translation.en: But you let go anyway.
translation.zh: ‎但你还是放手了

translation.en: And when you let go, you start to fall.
translation.zh: ‎当你放手时 你开始往下掉

translation.en: It's not a bad sensation though.
translation.zh: ‎但那并不是一种不好的感觉

translation.en: The falling is actually kind of slow and gentle, to your surprise,
translation.zh: ‎反而是出乎意料地缓慢而温柔

translation.en: but you're dropping down.
translation.zh: ‎你在往下掉

translation.en: And you say, "I'm willing to lose everything."
translation.zh: ‎你说“我愿意失去一切”

translation.en: And you have to say it silently,
translation.zh: ‎你必须默默地说

translation.en: but you want to really feel the, uh, intent behind that.
translation.zh: ‎你必须默默地说 ‎你要真正感受到其背后的意图

translation.en: And the moment you say that,
translation.zh: ‎而在你说这句话的那一刻

translation.en: you hit the surface of a sun that was down there below you,
translation.zh: ‎你落在了位于下方的太阳表面上

translation.en: and your body burns up.
translation.zh: ‎整个身体燃烧了起来

translation.en: Now, at that point, you have lost everything,
translation.zh: ‎此刻 你已经失去了一切

translation.en: because the instrument of possession is your physical body.
translation.zh: ‎因为你的肉体是拥有事物的前提

translation.en: So if your physical body's burnt up, you're just one sunbeam
translation.zh: ‎如今你的肉体燃烧殆尽了

translation.en: amongst all these other sunbeams.
translation.zh: ‎你就变成了其中的一缕阳光

translation.en: You're radiating outward in all directions,
translation.zh: ‎你在向四面八方放射着光芒

translation.en: and what you're radiating is a very loving, giving, outflowing sensation.
translation.zh:
‎你放射的是一种非常有爱的
‎给予的、流动的感觉

translation.en: And then you look around,
translation.zh: ‎然后你环顾四周

translation.en: and you see, all around you, an infinite number of other suns,
translation.zh: ‎你看到你周围有无限多的其他太阳

translation.en: just like the one you're inside of, all of which are radiating outwards.
translation.zh:
‎它们都在向外放射着光芒
‎就像你掉进的那颗太阳一样

translation.en: And then you hear the suns, all of them, saying in unison,
translation.zh: ‎然后你听到所有的太阳齐声说

translation.en: "We are everywhere."
translation.zh: ‎“我们无处不在”

translation.en: This world is called a sun world.
translation.zh: ‎这个世界被称为太阳世界

translation.en: All you can do is give. You can't take.
translation.zh: ‎你唯一能做的就是给予 你不能索取

translation.en: You can't grasp. You can't hold on to anything. It's just impossible.
translation.zh: ‎你不能抓住任何东西 这是不可能的

translation.en: Now you can open your eyes.
translation.zh: ‎可以睁开眼睛了

translation.en: How'd it feel?
translation.zh: ‎感觉如何？

translation.en: [Jonah] Great.
translation.zh: ‎很棒

translation.en: -You don't wanna say anything else? -Yeah, I do.
translation.zh:
‎-没什么想说的吗？
‎-有

translation.en: Which is, I'm very good at nonattachment
translation.zh: ‎不执着于工作、身份或与他人的过节

translation.en: to, like, a job or an identity or a beef with someone.
translation.zh: ‎不执着于工作、身份或与他人的过节 ‎这方面我做得很好

translation.en: I can get there and use the tools to get there.
translation.zh: ‎我能用工具去实现这一点

translation.en: When it comes to things like a romantic relationship
translation.zh: ‎但当涉及到恋爱关系

translation.en: or a family member that I love,
translation.zh: ‎或者我所爱的家人之类的事情时

translation.en: the idea of losing those things,
translation.zh: ‎失去那些东西

translation.en: I struggle with that concept.
translation.zh: ‎是我难以接受的一个概念

translation.en: Think about it like this. You're not trying to become nonattached.
translation.zh: ‎这么说吧 ‎不是要你变得毫无牵挂

translation.en: You're trying to move towards nonattachment
translation.zh: ‎而是要你在每次对丧失感到恐惧时

translation.en: every time you get scared of a loss.
translation.zh: ‎试着走向不执着

translation.en: For most people,
translation.zh: ‎对大多数人来说

translation.en: they've never been nonattached for one second in their whole life.
translation.zh: ‎他们一生中从未有过心无牵挂的时候

translation.en: So even the fact that they can move towards that is… is helpful for them.
translation.zh:
‎因此即使能朝着这个方向前进
‎对他们也是有帮助的

translation.en: If you're human, it's not possible. It wouldn't even be good if you were totally nonattached.
translation.zh:
‎作为人类 完全无牵挂是不可能的
‎也不是件好事

translation.en: That makes a lot of sense.
translation.zh: ‎这解释很有道理

translation.en: So the goal is not to become completely nonattached. No.
translation.zh:
‎所以我们的目标
‎不是要变得完全无牵挂

translation.en: It's work towards no one person, place, or thing leaving you
translation.zh:
‎而是努力不让任何人、地方
‎或者事物的离开

translation.en: can completely take away your whole existence
translation.zh: ‎彻底夺走自己的整个存在

translation.en: and your sense of wholeness.
translation.zh: ‎以及自我完整感

translation.en: That's correct.
translation.zh: ‎没错

translation.en: I don't wanna leave anything in the shadows,
translation.zh: ‎我不想把任何东西留在阴影中

translation.en: because I don't want it to become this, like, thing that eats at me.
translation.zh: ‎因为我不想让它成为吞噬着我的东西

translation.en: And even your fears, I think, when you say them,
translation.zh: ‎我觉得把自己的恐惧和痛苦说出来

translation.en: or your pain, when you say it, does set you free in a lot of ways.
translation.zh:
‎我觉得把自己的恐惧和痛苦说出来 ‎-真的能让你得到解脱
‎-确实

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, it does.
translation.zh:
‎-真的能让你得到解脱
‎-确实

translation.en: [Jonah] And I use Loss Processing, and it really helps.
translation.zh:
‎我采用了丧失处理这个工具
‎它真的很有帮助

translation.en: I wanna be like a monk and be like, "These tools just help it all dissolve,"
translation.zh:
‎我想像和尚一样
‎说这些工具能将一切化解

translation.en: but I still feel that pain every day.
translation.zh: ‎但我仍然每天都感受到那种痛楚

translation.en: -You know? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你知道吗？
‎-是

translation.en: [Jonah] I still miss my brother.
translation.zh: ‎我还是很想念我哥哥

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, you will for a very long time.
translation.zh: ‎你不会停止想念他的

translation.en: But let me put it this way.
translation.zh: ‎但让我这么说吧

translation.en: Death is not a permanent condition.
translation.zh: ‎死亡不是一种永久性的状态

translation.en: You can… you can be afraid of death, that's fine,
translation.zh: ‎你可以害怕死亡 没关系

translation.en: as long as you feel something after death.
translation.zh: ‎重要的是 你要觉得死亡不是终点

translation.en: And that's rebirth.
translation.zh: ‎死亡后是重生

translation.en: The idea that rebirth is possible from the very worst,
translation.zh: ‎从最糟糕的事情中重生是可能的

translation.en: the dregs of the world, dregs of experience,
translation.zh: ‎从最糟糕的经历中重生是可能的

translation.en: and you can make something cyclically come alive again.
translation.zh: ‎让事情周期性地复活是可能的

translation.en: That's the closest a human being can get to God.
translation.zh: ‎这种想法是人类最接近上帝的方式

translation.en: Yeah, I understand it's just a reality and that life just does go on.
translation.zh:
‎我明白生活依旧继续
‎是我必须接受的现实

translation.en: But there's very few people on that list that I just don't want to fucking lose so…
translation.zh:
‎但有屈指可数的几个人
‎是我真的不想失去的

translation.en: I don't want to lose you either.
translation.zh: ‎我也不想失去你

translation.en: What do I do? [chuckles]
translation.zh: ‎我该怎么办？

translation.en: I think we should get married.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得我们应该结婚

translation.en: -I want a prenup. -[Jonah laughs]
translation.zh: ‎我要签订婚前协议

translation.en: Oh, yeah, here we go, some of the good ones. These are so sick.
translation.zh:
‎-哦 在这里呢
‎-这些太牛逼了

translation.en: [Stutz] Yeah, this…
translation.zh: ‎是啊

translation.en: [Jonah] One of the things that this movie is accomplishing for me while I'm making it
translation.zh: ‎制作这部电影对我的帮助之一是

translation.en: is that I used to think that the people I look up to
translation.zh: ‎我曾经以为我所仰慕的那些人

translation.en: are absolved of the problems that I have.
translation.zh: ‎是不会遇到我所遇到的问题的

translation.en: [laughs] I'm sorry.
translation.zh: ‎抱歉

translation.en: I understand. I under--
translation.zh: ‎我能理解

translation.en: [Jonah] It's absurd. I know. It really is absurd. It's not…
translation.zh: ‎我知道这真的很荒唐

translation.en: -You're laughing 'cause it's absurd. -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-你笑是因为这很荒唐
‎-对

translation.en: Right. And I think it's good for people to see
translation.zh: ‎我觉得让大家看到这一点很好

translation.en: that you, for me, are someone who's created these things,
translation.zh: ‎对我来说 你是创造了这些东西的人

translation.en: and I think it's important that people who we look up to
translation.zh:
‎而我们所仰慕的人
‎也免不了遇到我们所遇到的问题

translation.en: aren't exempt from all the problems that we ourselves have.
translation.zh:
‎而我们所仰慕的人
‎也免不了遇到我们所遇到的问题 ‎我觉得明白这一点很重要

translation.en: You are still in the struggle and in the fight of being a human just like everybody else is.
translation.zh:
‎你仍然像其他人一样
‎经历着身为人的挣扎与奋斗

translation.en: Your whole thing is that you're never exempt from the pain
translation.zh:
‎你的整个设定就是
‎我们永远摆脱不了痛苦

translation.en: or the uncertainty or the constant work.
translation.zh: ‎或不确定性 或不间断的努力

translation.en: And I think there's something beautiful about seeing your vulnerability,
translation.zh:
‎我觉得能看到你脆弱的一面
‎是一件很唯美的事

translation.en: for me, that dissects that there will never be anyone that has it all figured out.
translation.zh:
‎对我来说 这剖明了
‎永远不会有知道所有答案的人

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: That's the secret of life.
translation.zh: ‎那就是人生的秘密

translation.en: -As far as I'm concerned. -Is what?
translation.zh:
‎-就我而言
‎-秘密是什么？

translation.en: [Stutz] Accepting that you won't figure it out ever. Nobody else will figure it out.
translation.zh:
‎接受你永远不会知道所有的答案
‎没有人会知道所有的答案

translation.en: Happiness depends on how you accept that
translation.zh: ‎快乐取决于你如何接受这一点

translation.en: and what you do about it.
translation.zh: ‎以及你如何看待它

translation.en: But first is accept it, because if you don't accept it,
translation.zh:
‎但首先是要接受它
‎因为如果你不接受它

translation.en: you have this thing in your mind that I can get over it
translation.zh:
‎你脑子里就会有
‎可以克服它或消除它的想法

translation.en: or under it and eliminate it, and you can't.
translation.zh:
‎你脑子里就会有
‎可以克服它或消除它的想法 ‎而你并不能

translation.en: This is such a great moment right now.
translation.zh: ‎这是很棒的一刻

translation.en: Could you guys stay just like this, and I'm gonna go home and go to sleep?
translation.zh:
‎你们能不能就这样呆着
‎我先回家睡觉了

translation.en: When I get back here in the morning, I want to find you just…
translation.zh: ‎我明早回到这里时 想看到你们…

translation.en: -Would that be reasonable? -[Jonah] Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-这样合理吗？
‎-嗯

translation.en: Are you tired?
translation.zh: ‎你累了吗？

translation.en: -Yeah, I'm kind of tired. -[Jonah] All right, go lay down.
translation.zh: ‎对 我有点累了 ‎好吧 你去躺下吧

translation.en: What do you see when you close your eyes?
translation.zh: ‎你闭上眼睛时看到了什么？

translation.en: I see an ocean.
translation.zh: ‎我看到大海

translation.en: And it's a beautiful beach, and the waves are--
translation.zh: ‎一片美丽的海滩 海浪…

translation.en: They're not huge waves. They're just perfectly formed waves.
translation.zh: ‎不是巨浪 只是形状完美的海浪

translation.en: And they're running up and down my body now.
translation.zh: ‎海浪现在打在我的身上

translation.en: [Jonah] Is the water warm or cold?
translation.zh: ‎水是暖的还是冷的？

translation.en: Warm.
translation.zh: ‎暖的

translation.en: You know what my mother said when my brother, um, went into the hospital?
translation.zh:
‎你知道我弟弟入院的时候
‎我妈妈说了什么吗？

translation.en: She said, "He went… he… he entered it as an infant,"
translation.zh: ‎她说“他进去的时候是个婴儿”

translation.en: or, you know, he was three,
translation.zh: ‎当时他只有三岁嘛

translation.en: "but three months later," I think it was three months later when he died,
translation.zh:
‎“但三个月后”
‎我想他死的时候是三个月后

translation.en: "he was a grown man."
translation.zh: ‎“他已经成人了”

translation.en: So something… He was transformed.
translation.zh: ‎他蜕变了

translation.en: It made me feel so, um, sad, but also,
translation.zh: ‎这让我感到非常难过 但也…

translation.en: Also in awe, I guess.
translation.zh: ‎也非常敬畏

translation.en: -[Jonah] Can you see him now? -[exhales] What?
translation.zh:
‎-你现在能看到他吗？
‎-什么？

translation.en: [Jonah] You see him now?
translation.zh: ‎你现在看到他了吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, it's… He… he's not particularly--
translation.zh: ‎对 他不是特别…

translation.en: I feel that that is my brother, but, you know, he feels like…
translation.zh: ‎我感觉那是我弟弟 但感觉他…

translation.en: He feels like he's your age, actually.
translation.zh: ‎感觉他和你年龄相仿

translation.en: He says… [inhales]
translation.zh: ‎他说

translation.en: …he didn't give me enough advance warning about his death.
translation.zh: ‎他没及早告诉我他会死

translation.en: He's saying…
translation.zh: ‎他说…

translation.en: He's saying it didn't bother him that much. He… he knew about it.
translation.zh:
‎他说他的死没给他造成太大的困扰
‎他早就知道了

translation.en: I don't see how he could have… told me.
translation.zh: ‎他又怎么可能告诉我呢？

translation.en: Maybe. I don't know.
translation.zh: ‎也许吧 我不知道

translation.en: I swear, I know this is impossible, but I'm having this feeling
translation.zh: ‎我知道这不可能 但我发誓

translation.en: as if I'm flying.
translation.zh: ‎我有种正在飞的感觉

translation.en: [Jonah] How does it feel?
translation.zh: ‎那感觉如何？

translation.en: Great.
translation.zh: ‎很棒

translation.en: Can I, uh, sit up?
translation.zh: ‎我能坐起来吗？

translation.en: [Jonah] You're flying through the air?
translation.zh: ‎你正在空中飞翔吗？

translation.en: Well, I'm… I'm hoping that'll stop when my feet…
translation.zh:
‎我是希望我双脚碰到地面时
‎就会停下…

translation.en: [splutters] Are you insured for that?
translation.zh: ‎你买飞行保险了吗？

translation.en: -[Jonah laughs] Yeah, you wanna sit up? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-哈 你想坐起来吗？
‎-对

translation.en: [Jonah] Yeah, sit up. Of course.
translation.zh: ‎那就坐起来吧

translation.en: -This is a nice room. -[Jonah laughs]
translation.zh: ‎这房间真不错

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: ‎哇

translation.en: This is the real challenge for me every day, is to get out of bed.
translation.zh: ‎这是我每天面临的真正挑战 起床

translation.en: Maybe it's just an attempt to gain control over me or…
translation.zh:
‎我不知道
‎也许你只是企图控制我 或者…

translation.en: I'm not sure. Why did you?
translation.zh: ‎我不知道 是为什么呢？

translation.en: [Jonah] All those reasons.
translation.zh: ‎上述所有原因

translation.en: -Should somebody grab your medicine? -Yeah.
translation.zh:
‎-要不要去给你拿药？
‎-好

translation.en: I like the background the way it is,
translation.zh: ‎我喜欢这样的背景

translation.en: because a lot of people have dreams
translation.zh: ‎因为很多人都做过这样的梦

translation.en: where they… they have… they discover another bedroom in their house,
translation.zh: ‎他们会发现家里有另一间卧室

translation.en: or sometimes they'll discover, like, a whole huge thing.
translation.zh: ‎有时候他们会发现一个巨大的东西

translation.en: What it really means in the dream world is you're becoming more conscious.
translation.zh:
‎这种梦其实意味着
‎你正在变得更有意识

translation.en: Your view of the universe is expanding.
translation.zh: ‎你对宇宙的认识正在扩大

translation.en: So people have dreams that there's a room in their house that's not there,
translation.zh:
‎所以人们梦见自己家里
‎有个不存在的房间意味着

translation.en: and it means their mind is expanding or they're growing?
translation.zh: ‎他们思想在拓展 或者他们在成长？

translation.en: Yeah. Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: ‎对

translation.en: That's crazy.
translation.zh: ‎太不可思议了

translation.en: …won't recover. I say, "Do what the fuck I tell you."
translation.zh: ‎…自己好不起来 我会说 ‎“完全按照我他妈说的去做

translation.en: "Do exactly what I tell you. I guarantee you'll feel better."
translation.zh: ‎“完全按照我他妈说的去做 ‎我保证你会感觉好点”

translation.en: [Jonah] Wait, I have an idea.
translation.zh: ‎等等 我有个主意

translation.en: Yeah, go ahead.
translation.zh: ‎说吧

translation.en: [Jonah] Since we already shot the opening of the movie,
translation.zh: ‎由于我们已经拍了电影的开头

translation.en: this might be for the end of the movie,
translation.zh: ‎这段可能会是电影的结尾

translation.en: if we're saying why I made this movie now, after all we've been through.
translation.zh: ‎我想在我们经历了这么多之后说一下 ‎我为什么要拍这部电影

translation.en: That's good.
translation.zh: ‎好主意

translation.en: See if you can… just really fast,
translation.zh: ‎看你能不能…很快就好

translation.en: see if you can say the beginning, and then, right after that, say the end.
translation.zh:
‎看你能不能说开头
‎然后紧接着说结尾

translation.en: I'm making this movie
translation.zh: ‎我之所以想拍这部电影

translation.en: because I want to give therapy and the tools I've learned in therapy
translation.zh:
‎是因为我想把治疗
‎和我在治疗中所学到的工具

translation.en: to as many people as possible through a film.
translation.zh: ‎通过电影介绍给尽可能多的人

translation.en: I made this movie
translation.zh: ‎我之所以拍了这部电影

translation.en: because I love Phil…
translation.zh: ‎是因为我爱菲尔

translation.en: because I love the life these tools allowed for me to have.
translation.zh:
‎因为我爱这些工具
‎让我得以拥有的生活

translation.en: And it doesn't matter what people think about the movie.
translation.zh: ‎人们对这部电影的看法并不重要

translation.en: It just matters that we finished it.
translation.zh: ‎重要的是我们完成了它

translation.en: Together.
translation.zh: ‎一起完成了它

translation.en: Yeah, I feel closer to you now than when we started,
translation.zh:
‎对 跟刚开始拍摄时相比
‎我现在感觉跟你更亲近了

translation.en: which I think is a great sign.
translation.zh: ‎我觉得这非常棒

translation.en: It's also great luck for me, you know, at age 74.
translation.zh: ‎对74岁的我来说 也是一种福气

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: ‎我爱你

translation.en: I still wish you would stop dumping so much shit on me.
translation.zh: ‎我还是希望你不要老把包袱丢给我

translation.en: ♪ The last long day she said goodbye ♪ ♪ Well, Lord, I thought I would cry ♪
translation.zh: ‎（献给我们的兄弟们）

translation.en: [Jonah] When we shot, like, months ago,
translation.zh: ‎我们几个月前拍摄时

translation.en: you had mentioned a relationship that was kind of on and off for a long time,
translation.zh:
‎你曾提到过
‎一段断断续续地维持了很久的关系

translation.en: and then you mentioned to me briefly in a phone call
translation.zh: ‎然后你在电话中简短地跟我提到

translation.en: how you had reached out to that person,
translation.zh: ‎然后你在电话中简短地跟我提到 ‎你主动联系了那个人

translation.en: and I wanna ask you about it but only if you wanna talk about it.
translation.zh:
‎所以我想问问你
‎但前提是你愿意谈这件事

translation.en: It's so amazing.
translation.zh: ‎真的很棒

translation.en: This is-- She's the closest person in the world to me.
translation.zh: ‎她是我在这世上最亲近的人

translation.en: Mostly, when we were younger, not wanting to be in a relationship,
translation.zh: ‎我们年轻的时候不想谈恋爱

translation.en: mostly it was me.
translation.zh: ‎主要是因为我

translation.en: I didn't have the will to make it work.
translation.zh: ‎我没有意愿去维持一段感情

translation.en: Now I do.
translation.zh: ‎但现在我有了

translation.en: -Did you reach out after our conversation? -Yeah, it actually… it helped me. Yeah.
translation.zh: ‎我们谈话后你联系她了吗？ ‎对 那帮了我很多

translation.en: -Our conversation made me a bit ashamed. -[Jonah] In what way?
translation.zh:
‎-我们的谈话也让我有些惭愧
‎-怎么说？

translation.en: That I was doing something, like, without full commitment,
translation.zh: ‎我没有全心全意地投入去做一件事

translation.en: like in a half-assed way.
translation.zh: ‎就是个半吊子

translation.en: So that was very helpful.
translation.zh: ‎所以那场谈话非常有帮助

translation.en: Who do you think's more scared of trying it out for real between you two?
translation.zh:
‎你觉得你们俩之间
‎谁更害怕真正地去尝试恋爱？

translation.en: You or her?
translation.zh: ‎你还是她？

translation.en: You think you'll be able to let down some walls
translation.zh: ‎你觉得你能不能放下心防

translation.en: and put some fears aside to try, or you want to?
translation.zh: ‎抛开恐惧去尝试？ ‎你想不想尝试？

translation.en: [splutters] Yeah, I'm going to. Yeah. What would be the hopeful outcome?
translation.zh:
‎-想 我打算尝试
‎-希望的结果是什么？

translation.en: The hopeful outcome is it works out.
translation.zh: ‎这段感情能开花结果

translation.en: That would be the hopeful outcome.
translation.zh: ‎那是我希望的结果
